meanings.definition: A school or college, especially one in the Islamic world.
meanings.sent1: The madrassahs in the town provide education to many students.
meanings.sent2: Children attend madrassahs to learn about their faith.
meanings.sent3: The madrassahs were so full of eager learners that they ran out of chairs!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the madrassahs stood out like beacons of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The grand madrassahs with their intricate architecture left a lasting impression on visitors.

meanings.definition: A place of learning, typically focused on religious education.
meanings.sent1: Visiting the local madrassahs helped me understand different cultures.
meanings.sent2: She devoted her time to teaching at the madrassahs in the village.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sneaked into the madrassahs and caused chaos!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a madrassahs, filled with teachings and reflections.
meanings.sent5: The serene atmosphere of the madrassahs made studying there a peaceful experience.
